docs.title: Homepage
docs.text: Welcome to my site's homepage!

docs.title: Cuphead
docs.text: This isn't so much as a game "guide" but more like a resource page.

docs.title: Graveyard Puzzle (DLC)
docs.text:
This is a helpful picture for completing the graveyard puzzle on World 4, since the graveyard puzzle is random per save file.

Credits to this reddit post: https://www.reddit.com/r/Cuphead/comments/137locl/graveyard_puzzle_tutorial/?rdt=43022

Info

Just remember the order in which you talk to them. (This too is also random!)

If you still are having trouble, here is a table you could follow:

docs.title: Possible solutions:
docs.text: Direction from the middle gravestone Lantern's quote Shovel's quote Pickaxe's quote Up I can't believe I've won! Things are looking up! Second place? I've had it up to here with second place! Third place? I guess things can only go up from here! Left There's no way the others could have caught me! I left 'em in the dust! Second place! The only thing left to do is get better for next year. I thought I had left behind being a bum. Third place! What a joke. Right I'm the winner and all is right in the world. I may have gotten second place, but I think I did all right. It ain't right! I trained too hard only to come in third! Down I may have won, but I don't look down on anyone for trying to compete. I've been down all morning, but this second place finish has me smiling! Worse than last year! Down to third place. Up Left As a winner, I never gave up! Left 'em looking foolish! If the judging was left up to me, I wouldn't be in second place. All I can do is throw my hands up. Left to wallow in third place. Up Right Leave it to an upright citizen like me to win the whole thing! I got up right at the crack of dawn just to come in second!? They think they're better than me? They can stick it right up their nose! Down Left I was the first to the top, and those losers were left down at the bottom! I left downtown in a hurry, and forgot my gear. I'll settle for second. My pals cheered me on, but I let 'em down. Left the race in third. Down Right I always win! I am downright awesome! Second place just ain't right! Down one place from last year. It's downright criminal they let these other jokers compete.

docs.title: Phantom Forces
docs.text: This is not so much a guide as it is a resource page.

docs.title: WIP
docs.text: This is a table:| Rank | Unnamed: 1 | Weapon | Optic | Barrel | Underbarrel | Other | Ammo | Comments | |-------:|:-------------|:----------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------|:--------------|:------------------|:------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | nan | nan | nan | Please hover over the attachments to see notes for alternative options! If you are in HTML view and cannot see the notes, scroll right to the HTML View Note Sheets! | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | nan | nan | nan | We are in the process of updating the sheet for the huge v11.0.0 update! Stay tuned | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | nan | nan | Primaries | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | nan | nan | Assault Rifles | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 0 | nan | AK12 | Z-Point | Muzzle Brake | Potato Grip | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | Hyperburst is still really good! Trust me (lll￢ω￢) Well rounded with very low automatic recoil and high velocity | | 10 | nan | AN-94 | Delta Sight | Suppressor | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | 7.62x39mm | Lowest base recoil out of all assault rifles (º □ º l|l) High minimum damage with slow RPM, but a unique 1800 RPM initial burst every trigger pull! | | 15 | nan | AS VAL | Delta Sight | Suppressor..? | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Extended Mag | Good at everything, but has very slow velocity and reload speed. If you miss the higher RPM it used to have, check out the Vikhr Suppressor SR-3M! | | 16 | nan | SCAR-L | Coyote Sight | ARS Suppressor | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Extremely consistent long range performance with slow RPM and low recoil. Range reducing attachments don't hurt a lot as the weapon always four taps! | | 20 | ⭐ | AUG A1 | Coyote Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Very long range values and almost no recoil with the right setup! Comparable to the SCAR-L, trading a little base damage for fire rate | | 22 | ⭐ | M16A4 | Delta Sight | Suppressor | Sideways Grip | Yellow Laser | 6.5 Grendel | I know this loadout looks crazy, but read the notes and the alt sheet!!! One of the best ARs with excellent recoil, fire rate, and customizability o(°▽°)o | | 25 | nan | G36 | Comp Aimpoint | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | Great minimum damage and penetration with good accuracy. 23 minimum damage allows the weapon to kill at any range with 3 limb shots and 1 headshot! | | 28 | nan | M16A1 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Booster | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | M855 | Unique RPM heating mechanic with great handling and velocity. M855 is extremely powerful up close, but fires randomly deviating/tumbling bullets | | 31 | ⭐ | M16A3 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | 6.5 Grendel | Ubiquitous meta AR- low recoil, great at doing everything. Burst grouping is extremely strong with 6.5 Grendel, check the alt sheet!!! (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ. ✧ | | 37 | ⭐ | TYPE 20 | Mini Sight | ARS Suppressor | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Extended Mag | Does everything both the SCAR-L and AK74 can but with a tiny bit more base recoil. Extremely high base penetration and access to a 40rd magazine! | | 39 | ⭐ | AUG A2 | Barska Electro | Muzzle Brake | Pistol Grip | Green Laser | 7.62x39mm | Able to three tap up close compared to the AUG A1, but has less overall ranged damage. 7.62x39mm has very powerful base stats and overall performance | | 42 | ⭐ | K2 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Solid generalist auto in the same vein as the M16A3. Has the potential to three tap with a bonus torso multiplier, but has less friendly recoil in comparsion | | 45 | ⭐ | FAMAS F1 | Mini Sight | ARS Suppressor | Angled Grip | FAMAS G2 | Armor Piercing | High RPM with good range and moderate recoil. FAMAS G2 fires extremely fast and is one of the most powerful medium range autos in the game (゜▽゜) | | 47 | nan | AK47 | Mini Sight | Muzzle Brake | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Generally power crept by the STG-44. Very high damage with similar ranges to some battle rifles! High initial kick, but good overall full-auto accuracy | | 52 | nan | AUG A3 | Coyote Sight | T-Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Less three tap range than the AUG A2, but much lower initial kick- overall accuracy is similar to the AUG A1. .300 BLK is interesting, but outclassed | | 55 | nan | L85A2 | Coyote Sight | ARS Suppressor | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Nearly identical performance to the AUG A1. Fires slightly faster with higher penetration, but requires two headshots to three tap up close | | 64 | ⭐ | HK416 | Comp Aimpoint | Squad Barrel | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Read the notes! Solid overall and very similar to the M16A3, firing slightly faster with less penetration and different recoil. Hollow points are strong here! | | 74 | nan | AK74 | Delta Sight | ARS Suppressor | Sideways Grip | Green Laser | Default | Very consistent and strong! Extremely low recoil with excellent damage and range, but slightly below average fire rate | | 94 | nan | AKM | Mini Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Significantly lower initial kick, but worse three tap range (90) compared to the AK47 (118) 🍌Banana Mag 🍌 | | 103 | nan | AK103 | Delta Sight | BARS Barrel | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | 103: Friendlier recoil and further three tap to the AKM, lower min damage. 109: BORN TO SWAY || ACCURACY IS A F || 410,757,864,530 DEAD PHANTOMS | | 111 | ⭐ | TAR-21 | Delta Sight | ARS Suppressor | Folding Grip | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | Read the underbarrel and ammo note please (lll￢ω￢) Excellent performance at all ranges with high multipliers and RPM but noticeable horizontal kick | | 122 | ⭐ | TYPE 88 | Mini Sight | T-Brake | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | 7.62x39mm | The TYPE 58 (7.62x39mm) is a direct upgrade to the AKM with better RPM and recoil! Default ammo is generally outclassed by the AK74 but has great hipfire | | 123 | nan | M231 | Delta Sight | ARS Suppressor | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | Blisteringly fast fire rate which somewhat makes up for the atrocious recoil (^∇^) Hipfire loadouts are very powerful and technically more accurate | | 128 | ⭐ | C7A2 | Mini Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | 6.5 Grendel | Lower recoil, lower damage M16A3. Read the barrel notes! You might find some gems rolling with the less conventional barrel attachments ┌(o^▽^o)┘ | | 144 | nan | STG-44 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | 5.56x45mm | Very high potential with good recoil and damage, but a below average fire rate which punishes missed shots. One of the best overall assault rifles | | 211 | nan | G11K2 | Mini Sight | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Yellow Laser | Default | Fast burst DMR with a 72 stud torso kill range. Buffed during the 2024 New Years update with greatly improved muzzle velocity and optic sway! | | nan | nan | Carbines | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 0 | nan | M4A1 | Reflex Sight | ARS Suppressor | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | 6.5 Grendel | Easy to use starter carbine with good accuracy and handling but quick damage drop off. Abnormally stable from the hip, try playing with hipfire builds! | | 6 | nan | G36K | Delta Sight | ARS Suppressor | Sideways Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | Extremely standard automatic weapon with a few small caveats. Laserbeam accuracy and amazing handling, but strong initial vertical kick | | 14 | nan | M4 | Mini Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Full Stock | 6.5 Grendel | Burst weapon with high fire rate and low base kick. Competes with the MP5K/10 burst and M16A4, has more minimum damage compared to the M4A1 | | 28 | ⭐ | L22 | Coyote Sight | Muzzle Brake | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | Abnormally high minimum damage, extremely powerful! Similar to the AUG A1 and L85A2, having worse limb shot performance but better fire rate | | 32 | nan | SCAR PDW | Delta Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | 7.62x51mm | Generally overshadowed by the AK74 due to its higher minimum damage, but the SCAR PDW reloads faster | | 35 | nan | AKU12 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Super Armor Pier. | Outclassed by the M4A1 with slightly worse overall parameters but negligibly better overall accuracy (with the correct loadout!) | | 42 | nan | GROZA-1 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Good mix of damage and fire rate with decent accuracy and a lot of different conversions to play around with. I like the GROZA-1 a lot personally | | 48 | nan | OTS-126 | Comp Aimpoint | Muzzle Brake | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Default | Very similar performance to the UMP45 with a much greater magazine size but much bouncier recoil. Hipfire loadouts are more accurate than aiming! | | 51 | nan | AK12C | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Potato Grip | Yellow Laser | Default | Strictly a burst loadout, otherwise use 9x39mm or the GROZA-1 instead! Can be terrifying at close range with its 1000 RPM burst mode and good three tap | | 62 | ⭐ | HONEY BADGER | Delta Sight | Squad Barrel | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Nearly identical performance to the M16A3- integrally suppressed with better reload speed, but worse range and accuracy. Hollow points are extremely strong! | | 63 | ⭐ | K1A | Coyote Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Good fire rate and recoil with low base damage and an unusual torso multiplier. Still great overall, but very power-crept | | 69 | nan | SR-3M | Delta Sight | Vikhr Suppressor | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Extended Mag | If you miss the old AS VAL with 900 RPM, this is essentially the same thing with better medium range performance but lower minimum damage | | 79 | nan | GROZA-4 | Delta Sight | Default | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Default | Zero to hero thanks to the Halloween update! Extremely high maximum damage with excellent recoil and three tap range, but very very very poor velocity | | 86 | nan | MC51 | Comp Aimpoint | ARS Suppressor | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Silent | A very unique battle rifle archetype with below average damage but amazing utility and recoil. Any suppressor + silent ammo goes crazy on Warehouse | | 89 | nan | FAL 50.63 PARA | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | 5.56x45mm | Absurd combination of three tap range and fire rate with low but floaty initial kick. Easy head + limb two tap, dominates medium range | | 93 | nan | 1858 CARBINE | TA11 Acog | Muzzle Brake | Skeleton Grip | Blue Laser | Default | Sidegrade to the HENRY 45-70 with better RPM and mag size but lower velocity and penetration. .36 + Long barrel is a spicy but powerful sniper option | | 105 | ⭐ | AK105 | Delta Sight | BARS Barrel | Vertical Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Probably the best assault rifle in the game right now: Similar performance to the M16A3 with absolutely no recoil and more RPM, but it can't be suppressed | | 114 | nan | JURY | DDHB Reflex | Muzzle Brake | Skeleton Grip | Blue Laser | Birdshot | Lots of potential on paper with crazy fire rate and headshot range, but burns through ammo quickly. Birdshot is actually really good! | | 125 | nan | KAC SRR | Coyote Sight | Default | Romanian Grip | Speedloader | Default | Very similar to the JURY, trading the utility of a torso kill range for slightly better fire rate and magazine size. Speedloader works much better here :) | | 127 | nan | GYROJET CARBINE | DDHB Reflex | Default | Angled Grip | Green Laser | Default | Borderline overpowered past 150 studs with crazy fast fire rate and the ability to one tap to the torso. Awkward ramp up velocity with other weird parameters | | 128 | nan | C8A2 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | 6.5 Grendel | 6.5 Grendel loadout, but the base gun wants other attachments- check the alt sheet! Excellent handling with a good effective range and high RPM | | 130 | nan | X95R | Delta Sight | Compensator | Pistol Grip | Green Laser | .300 BLK | I wanna make the X95R work so badly o(TヘTo) Good minimum damage considering its RPM, but its recoil isn't consistent enough compared to other autos | | 157 | nan | HK51B | Comp Aimpoint | Compensator | Sideways Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Surprisingly lightweight and terrifying at point blank with expectedly horrendous recoil and range. Reaches 14.00 walkspeed with short barrel 👀 | | 222 | nan | CAN CANNON | DDHB Reflex | Heavy Can | Skeleton Grip | Blue Laser | .50 Beowulf | There's a lot of mix-and-matching you can do here, and it's pretty fun! Outclassed by other one tap weapons, but you're not using it to be meta anyway lol | | nan | nan | PDWs | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 0 | nan | MP5K | Mini Sight | Long Barrel | Stubby Grip | Burst Grouping | 10mm Auto | Lowest recoil in class with an amazing time-to-kill up close, but very poor range and velocity. 10mm Auto is very strong, but much different than default | | 5 | ⭐ | UMP45 | Coyote Sight | Long Barrel | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | .45 Super | Excellent overall damage and range with relatively smooth yet shaky recoil. Extremely poor velocity makes it a little difficult to use at longer ranges | | 7 | nan | G36C | Delta Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Default | One of the most potent close range weapons in the game, with excellent handling and recoil, just mind the initial kick | | 9 | ⭐ | MP7 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Sideways Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | Excellent combination of fire rate, recoil, and penetration with low base damage. Solid performance in nearly every situation! | | 23 | ⭐ | MAC10 | OKP-7 | Carbine Barrel | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | .45 Super | Check the alt sheet!!! Most "viably customizable" PDW with tons of great loadout choices. Amazing close range performance, fast damage falloff | | 24 | nan | P90 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Great auto for wallbangs with great magazine size, fire rate, and penetration on top of amazing accuracy. Do you remember March 26th, 2024? | | 36 | ⭐ | COLT MARS | Mini Sight | Squad Barrel | Angled Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Amazing generalist auto after the v10.2.1 update- Long three tap range with excellent handling, penetration, and overall utility. Hollows >>> Default!! | | 40 | nan | MP5 | Coyote Sight | Long Barrel | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Plus P | Generally overshadowed by the M4A1- Extremely low recoil with a good three tap range, but horrible velocity makes it difficult to use at longer ranges | | 49 | ⭐ | COLT SMG 633 | Delta Sight | Long Barrel | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Exceptional reload speed and hipfire stability with very fast fire rate, but rather high vertical recoil when aimed. Amazing TTK up to medium range | | 53 | ⭐ | L2A3 | Delta Sight | Long Barrel | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | .45 ACP | Good stats in every department with laserbeam accuracy and a very slow fire rate. Great performance to the head at all ranges with plenty of breakpoints | | 60 | nan | MP5SD | Coyote Sight | Default | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Plus P | Sidegrade to the MP5 with integral suppression and slightly lower base kick, but slightly worse range and velocity | | 66 | nan | MP10 | Comp Aimpoint | T-Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Default | Sorta swept under the rug by the PDW rebalance update when it received heavy nerfs to velocity and recoil (lll￢ω￢) | | 71 | ⭐ | M3A1 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Booster | Vertical Grip | Retract Stock | .45 Super | A hidden gem from the PDW rebalance with absurd breakpoint ranges and recoil! Surprisingly versatile once you get adjusted to its low velocity and RPM | | 74 | nan | MP5/10 | Delta Sight | Long Barrel | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | Default | One of the strongest three tap to RPM ratios in the game with excellent medium range performance and significant but controllable horizontal drift | | 77 | nan | UZI | Coyote Sight | Muzzle Brake | Vertical Grip | Extended Stock | Default | Excellent recoil with decent base damage and low fire rate. It also features a couple interesting conversions! | | 80 | nan | AUG A3 PARA XS | Delta Sight | Long Barrel | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | The best of both the MP5 and MP5SD with a bit less RPM, but super long ranges! (ノ°▽°) | | 84 | nan | K7 | Delta Sight | Default | Pistol Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Nearly identical, if not better performance than the COLT SMG 633. Suppressed by default with pretty friendly recoil compared to the competition | | 88 | nan | AKS74U | Mini Sight | ARS Suppressor | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | 7.62x39mm | Largely improved in the 2024 New Years update! Great overall performance across all three conversions with a preference for close range | | 92 | nan | PPSH-41 | Delta Sight | Obrez Barrel | Yellow Laser | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | A sidegrade to the P90- drops the high penetration and medium range damage for extremely high reserve ammo and even faster RPM! | | 98 | nan | FAL PARA SHORTY | Delta Sight | Compensator | Stubby Grip | Extend Stock | Default | Powerful punch at all ranges with excellent handling. Somehow gets blown out of the water by the 50.63 PARA and 50.00 damage wise, but handles faster | | 100 | ⭐ | KRISS VECTOR | Mini Sight | Long Barrel | Yellow Laser | Yellow Laser | .357 SIG | Lightning fast time-to-kill with moderate recoil and extremely poor velocity. .357 SIG is the star of the show, but it's been greatly nerfed in v11.0.0 | | 105 | nan | PP-19 BIZON | Delta Sight | Compensator | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Default | VERY decent gun that has no reeal downside apart from velocity, gets the job done | | 108 | nan | MP40 | Coyote Sight | Compensator | Angled Grip | Yellow Laser | Default | Nearly identical to the L2A3- has the utility to one head + one limb kill up to roughly 50 studs with worse (but still extremely low) recoil | | 115 | ⭐ | X95 SMG | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Pistol Grip | Green Laser | 5.56x30mm | Arguably destroyed by the PDW rebalance, but the ZITTARA still has some niche usage! It has similar performance to the L22 with generally higher stats | | 121 | ⭐ | TOMMY GUN | Delta Sight | Compensator | Sideways Grip | Blue Laser | .45 Super | One of the largest benefactors from the PDW rebalance with extremely long breakpoint ranges and moderate recoil. 10mm Auto is very strong, but sways a lot | | 126 | ⭐ | RAMA 1130 | Delta Sight | Long Barrel | Vertical Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Similar to the MP7- features an 80rd magazine with an accompanying fast reload speed, but horrible velocity and penetration | | 149 | nan | BWC9 A | Mini Sight | X-Ring | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Extended Mag | Very similar performance to the M17- Identical damage/range and can fire full auto with laser recoil, but no torso multiplier | | 155 | ⭐ | FIVE-0 | Delta Sight | ARS Suppressor | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | 9x19mm | Nearly overtuned performance across all conversions with abnormally high handling but pitiful velocity. If the binary firemode is hard to use, try burst! | | nan | nan | LMGs | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 0 | nan | COLT LMG | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Stubby Grip | Collapsible Stock | Default | Excellent range, damage, and recoil with no obvious disadvantages. Both conversions are very good as well（＾∀＾●） | | 19 | ⭐ | M60 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | A behemoth of stat product with an infinite three tap, long one head + one torso kill range, huge magazine size and very accurate yet rough kick | | 27 | ⭐ | AUG HBAR | Coyote Sight | T-Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Excellent ranged performance with extremely low recoil and absurd velocity (￣▽￣)ブ (￣▽￣)ブ | | 33 | nan | MG36 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Hollow Point | Good fire rate and penetration, very fast reload for a 100rd magazine (￣▽￣)ブ If this weapon still had 23 minimum damage it would probably be meta | | 37 | nan | RPK12 | Comp Aimpoint | T-Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Heavy AK12 with smoother kick but more horizontal sway: Burst is generally easier to use here. 7.62x39mm isn't crazy OP anymore (lll￢ω￢) | | 43 | nan | L86 LSW | Coyote Sight | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Long range auto beam weapon. Similar performance to the AN-94 with a far three tap range but much slower handling and more camera shake | | 54 | ⭐ | RPK | Delta Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Generally the "best" performing 7.62x39mm AK with moderate recoil and very high damage. Can three tap up to 139 studs! | | 67 | nan | HK21E | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Probably needs no introduction- One of the most annoying weapons to fight with strong parameters, but horrid and heavily RNG dependent accuracy | | 72 | ⭐ | HAMR IAR | Comp Aimpoint | Muzzle Booster | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Won't go down with my hamr Unique RPM heating mechanic with amazing stats across the board! | | 88 | nan | RPK74 | Delta Sight | Muzzle Booster | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Default | Power crept by the STG-N since the christmas update. Near identical to the COLT LMG- Better overall accuracy, but lower base fire rate and magazine size | | 101 | nan | MG3KWS | Delta Sight | Compensator | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Default | Check the alt sheet if you want a "no recoil" loadout! Been through the rework grinder so many times, lukewarm with poor ranges and high recoil | | 118 | ⭐ | M1918A2 | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | A combination of the STG-44 and SCAR-H- Long two tap range and can infinitely three tap with accurate recoil, but slow overall handling | | 176 | nan | MGV-176 | Z-Point | Compensator | Sideways Grip | Green Laser | Default | Insane potential TTK with excellent recoil. Below average performance on paper if you don't hit headshots, but still serviceable due to its high RPM | | 196 | nan | STONER 96 | Coyote Sight | Compensator | Vertical Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | If you miss the extreme long-range dominance of the old AUG HBAR, use this! (º □ º l|l) Plays like a very heavy SCAR-L with slightly slower RPM | | 226 | ⭐ | CHAINSAW | Default | Muzzle Booster | Yellow Laser | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | Powerful performance at every range with good accuracy and an absurd mag size. Why does this weapon even exist? | | 242 | nan | MG42 | AMT-Terminator | X-Ring | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Default | A more polarizing version of the MG3KWS- more damage and fire rate, worse handling and recoil | | nan | nan | Battle Rifles | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 2 | nan | M14 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | Default | Powerful starter battle rifle with horrible kick but an extremely fast TTK and very strong ranges. You'll definitely need some attachments for this weapon | | 21 | nan | BEOWULF ECR | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Nearly unmatched close quarters presence with a fast two tap range but a small magazine. Both conversions (besides .410) are also very powerful (´▽｀) | | 30 | nan | SCAR-H | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Yellow Laser | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | Extremely high damage with accurate but shaky recoil. Similar performance to the HK417- slightly better CQC, slightly worse LRC | | 44 | ⭐ | AK12BR | Z-Point | Halbek Device | Angled Grip | Yellow Laser | Armor Piercing | This is my gun ( ´ ∀ ) Weakest out of the battle rifles, but still has excellent damage performance with very low recoil and great reload speed | | 59 | ⭐ | G3A3 | Delta Sight | Suppressor | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Very high damage and range (even for its class) with an absurd headshot multiplier and near AN-94 levels of accuracy! Automatic DMR with weird recoil | | 76 | nan | AG-3 | Delta Sight | T-Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Easiest to use in class- worse than the SCAR-H on paper, but carried by its 1.7x head multiplier and very low kick | | 78 | nan | HK417 | Mini Sight | ARS Suppressor | Pistol Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Has the ability to three-tap to the torso at any range with a lot of bounce, works excellently when tap-firing at longer ranges | | 96 | nan | HENRY 45-70 | Default | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Remove Stock | Default | Good torso kill range and handling with below average velocity. Similar to a lot of slug shotguns with (generally) better stats | | 107 | ⭐ | FAL 50.00 | Delta Sight | Compensator | Romanian Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Strong combination of three tap range, accuracy, and fire rate. Reloads a bit slower compared to other battle rifles | | 181 | nan | HCAR | Coyote Sight | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Requires a little finesse to use, but is extremely versatile! Excellent magazine and reserve size for its ammo pool with a decently far reaching two tap | | nan | nan | DMRs | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 3 | nan | MK11 | TA11 Acog | Muzzle Brake | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | Extremely reliable DMR with consistent damage performance and a high skill cap. Recoil was buffed considerably during the 2024 New Years update! | | 13 | nan | SKS | Coyote Sight | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Armor Piercing | More aggressive compared to other DMRs with faster fire rate and lower recoil. Retains the ability to three tap at all ranges if you hit torso shots! | | 34 | nan | SL-8 | TA33 Acog | Marksman Barrel | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | .300 Whisper | Two distinct flavors with marksman barrel: Default ammo for a 30rd SKS with 3.2k velocity, or a 230 RPM SVU with much lower velocity! Both are very good | | 38 | nan | DRAGUNOV SVU | Delta Sight | Muzzle Brake | Romanian Grip | SVU-A Conversion | Default | An excellent archetype with a nearly unmatched balance of power and speed. While normally power crept by later DMRs, the SVU-A is very overtuned! | | 46 | nan | VSS VINTOREZ | Coyote Sight | Suppressor..? | Stubby Grip | Collapsible Stock | Hollow Point | Unique automatic mode with high overall potential and a very far two tap range. Excellent performance at all ranges, but below average velocity for a DMR | | 59 | ⭐ | MSG90 | PK-A | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | After the PDW rebalance update, this is a rare case where both Armor Piercing and Hollow Point are amazing here! Play around with both flavors! | | 68 | ⭐ | M21 | PK-A | Suppressor | Angled Grip | Green Laser | Armor Piercing | Very powerful with the new AP changes! Similar performance to the MSG90 with a lower overall stat product but much cleaner recoil | | 70 | nan | BEOWULF TCR | DDHB Reflex | Muzzle Brake | Angled Grip | Blue Laser | .458 SOCOM | Arguably the most power crept DMR in this meta, but has some niche play with .458 SOCOM! New hollow points also work pretty great here | | 78 | ⭐ | SA58 SPR | Z-Point | Muzzle Brake | Stubby Grip | Blue Laser | Hollow Point | Hollows are extremely strong here! I hope you can click fast- extremely powerful performance at all ranges with good accuracy and crazy damage | | 85 | nan | SCAR SSR | TA11 Acog | Muzzle Brake | Blue Laser | Blue Laser | Default | Commanding ranged performance with high velocity, RPM, and the ability to two-tap enemies at any range. One of the best LRC weapons in the game! | | nan | nan | Snipers | Read the note to the left!!!!! Make sure to use the non black scope alt aim on all the eligible scopes! | nan | nan | nan | nan | nan | | 0 | ⭐ | INTERVENTION | Vcog 6x Scope | Suppressor | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | Default | Excellent starter sniper with rather forgiving velocity and torso kill range. I'm mixed about its buff (lll￢ω￢) | | 12 | nan | MODEL 700 | Vcog 6x Scope | Heavy Barrel | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | Default | Check the alt sheet for a .32 ACP loadout! Not too interesting in its current state, well rounded in every aspect | | 41 | nan | AWS | PM II | Default | Skeleton Grip | Marksman Kit | Default | Shoots surprisingly fast with an enormous magazine size, but has slightly below average velocity (￣▽￣)" The special SUBSONIC ammo is really fun! | | 65 | nan | BFG 50 | ACOG Scope | Heavy Barrel | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | Default | If you wanna turn your brain off for the day and just click on people, more power to you! But that doesn't make this weapon any less annoying (┬┬﹏┬┬) | | 82 | nan | AWM | Vcog 6x Scope | Suppressor | Skeleton Grip | Marksman Kit | .338 Norma | Jack of all trades with two interesting ammo flavors (❁´◡❁) .338 Norma has crazy torso damage at all ranges (96+) even if you miss headshots | | 84 | nan | TRG-42 | TA11 Acog | Heavy Barrel | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | Default | A nearly direct upgrade to the INTERVENTION with additional torso kill range and velocity but slightly less RPM. Has some interesting conversions too | | 91 | ⭐ | MOSIN NAGANT | PU-1 Scope | Suppressor | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | 8x50mmR | Doesn't have a lot of close range utility, but features great fire rate and a forgiving two tap at any range. It also has 3000 velocity again :D | | 104 | ⭐ | DRAGUNOV SVDS | PSO-1 Scope | Muzzle Brake | Blue Laser | Default | 10/4.5x54R | BEHOLD!!! High versatility across all three of its conversions with absurd RPM, magazine size, and versatility! One of the best snipers the game has ever seen! | | 136 | nan | M1903 | TA11 Acog | Air Service Barrel | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | Armor Piercing | Slower mosin with a great torso kill range and a couple of wacky attachments! Above average at everything, besides magazine size | | 138 | nan | K14 | KOM 10x42 | Suppressor | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | .308 Win. | Very fast handling and fire rate, but demands headshots more than other snipers. .308 Win fixes that issue while still being speedy (ヾ;￣▽￣)ヾ | | 150 | nan | HECATE II | Vcog 6x Scope | Heavy Barrel | Skeleton Grip | Remove Stock | .416 Barrett | A direct upgrade to the BFG 50 with significantly better RPM and uptime. Highest spread in class, default ammo is on par with most birdshot shotties (∪.∪ )...zzz | | 120 | ⭐ | SPAS-12 | Remove Stock | Muzzle Brake | Romanian Grip | Green Laser | Flechette | Statistically a more forgiving MODEL 870 with double the fire rate and nearly identical range and spread | | 133 | nan | DT11 | Delta Sight | Combat Barrel | Angled Grip | Olympian Stock | Default | Extremely tight spread and high pellet count with a lot of powerful, unique attachments! Did you know the USAS has slightly less pellet spread than the DBV12? |

docs.title: Pig 64 Guide
docs.text:
This is a page which will instruct someone, on how to obtain all of Pig 64's badges. This will not go over how to get the Keymaster's badge from Piggy! If you need a guide on how to get the Keymaster badge look here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S5C-39FvIzM

Info

You need to have the Keymaster's badge from the main Piggy game before proceeding! The Subway and Mall maps should be unlocked before doing the quests.

Warning

This quest is not possible on console/with a controller due to several things like keypads, pipe puzzles and crafting not being picked up as buttons on a controller. So, it is suggested that players doing this should use a mobile device or PC if possible.

docs.title: Potato Pout
docs.text:
1. Use the Glitch Key given automatically by the Keymaster badge to open the glitched door in Subway. Interact with the crying Mr. P in the corner of the room. After talking to him, you'll want to head to the Arcade map.

  2. In the arcade map, there are four tiny levers hidden around the map, you'll want to flip all four of them to get access to the Birdy Bank.

  3. Buy the Big Dice item for 60 tokens. Follow the cord going from the vault to a room in the arcade. In the room where the cord ends, use the Big Dice four times. The numbers it lands on at the end of each use are the four digits in order required for the vault code.

Tip

The dice should light up green in the correct room. If the dice is not green, you are in the wrong room!

  1. Go inside the vault and talk to the NPC.

  2. Go to Subway again and enter the building window with the Mrs. P silhouette on it, which is accessible by jumping from the hotel building into the room. Grab the Mrs. P photo lying on the ground.

  3. Give the Mrs. P photo to Mr.P. He will start crying and will flood the city.

docs.title: Deep Depths
docs.text:
1. Activate the five valves across the flooded Subway, there are three in the city and two in the subway. They can be found next to the white grates. - The Flippers item from the shop can be bought to speed this part up.

  2. Next, buy the Infinite Jar of Coins and the Boombox. This is needed for the next part.

  3. Go to the Arcade and find the claw machine on the bottom floor.

  4. Move the claw using the songs on the Boombox.

Example

A song's capital letter indicates what direction the claw will move. For example, rUmble moves the claw up. Use Dimension to lower the claw.

  1. Collect the purple potato from the claw machine.

  2. Go back to Subway map and give the potato to Mr. P. This will drain all of the water from the map and leave behind his hat, which can be picked up and worn by the player once equipped.

docs.title: Operation: Employee
docs.text:
1. Buy the Suitcase. Hold it after equipping Mr. P's hat to access the tall building in the lobby.

  2. Input the code 362761 when prompted. This allows for entry into the building and then into the glitch world.

docs.title: Flip Side
docs.text:
1. Collect the items and complete the pipe puzzles scattered in each accessible area in the glitch world.

  2. Interact with Paco and insert the code HEEFTTECSE. This will give you access to crafting.

  3. Craft all the ingots you can which are used to get different items from AJ Alpaca.

docs.title: : eRrOr :
docs.text:
1. Leave and rejoin the game to access the normal world.

  2. Obtain the Brightblade from AJ Alpaca.

  3. Hit a player with the Brightblade. The screen will heavily be tinted red, followed by being blacked out as the following lines appear on screen:

The soft locks put in place only contained them for so long.

We really did try to make the Warehouse unobtainable, but they found a way.

What you've written in this code, the entire foundation, it can't be discovered, Ronald.

They're banned for now, but not rightfully.

Our time is running out.

  1. You will be forcefully kicked out of the game after the last line is done with the kick reason being ": eRrOr :"

  2. Rejoin the game. After rejoining, you will be prompted with a message from Netikz' moderation, and all wandering NPCs will not be visible

docs.title: Piggy Book 1 True Ending
docs.text:
This is a page which will instruct someone, on how to obtain Book 1's True Ending!

Info

You must have all the badges from Chapters 1-12 in Piggy: Book 1, including both the Good and Bad endings on the Plant map. Leaving the server will reset your progress! It is recommended to attempt this ending in a private server. It is also recommended to have either alt accounts or other people to help get the badge.

docs.title: Step 1:
docs.text:
1. Start a round on City - Chapter 9. The game mode must be Player + Bot! You must have at least one other person in the server with you, or the game will automatically choose Bot. If necessary, use an alt account or another person in your server to be the infected.

  2. Complete the map as normal, but do not escape the map after you open the exit.

  3. Walk over to the purple car, look underneath by moving your camera under the car, and grab the Mrs. P photo, just be careful not to get killed while trying to grab it.

Warning

If you pick up another item while holding the photo, it will disappear, and you will have to restart the map. It's recommended to either:

  1. Unlock the exit before grabbing the photo and escaping.

  2. Or if you are playing with another player(s), have either you or them complete the map while you or they are holding the photo, then escape once the exit is open without dying.

  1. Escape the map with the photo equipped in your hand. You can skip the cutscene.

Danger

Make sure that you do not leave the server after completing Step 1, if you do, then your progress will reset and you will have to start from the beginning.

docs.title: Step 2:
docs.text:
1. Pick Plant - Chapter 12 on any gamemode and escape like normal. When you finish the map, DO NOT skip the cutscene! Walk towards Mr. P like you would in the Bad Ending, and watch the full cutscene.

  2. You will get different dialogue, a different cutscene, and the end credits will change. After the cutscene ends, you will be awarded the badge and the Mr. P skin.

I followed these steps and still didn't get the badge. What did I do wrong?

If you didn't get the badge, make sure to check the following:

  1. You have all of the badges for Book 1, including both the Good and Bad endings of Plant.

  2. You are holding the photo when you escape the City, and not just keeping it in your inventory.

  3. Not leaving the server after finishing the City map.

  4. Not skipping the cutscene after you escape the Plant map. This will skip the ability to choose an ending and resets everything.

docs.title: Piggy Book 2 Secret Ending
docs.text:
This is a page which will instruct someone, on how to obtain Book 2's Secret Ending!

Info

At least one person in your server must have every single badge in Book 1 and 2 (including all Plant, Factory, and other Lab endings). This does not include event badges and the Secret Badge from Book 1. If you are playing with someone who has all the required badges, make sure they (and you) have the Savior Ending toggled in your Settings. Switching servers or leaving while attempting the ending will reset all of your progress. It is recommended to do this in a private server. It is also recommended to have either alt accounts or other people to help get the badge.

docs.title: Phase 1:
docs.text:
Info

Once you complete Phase 1, you will not need to complete it again unless you switch or leave the server.

docs.title: Step 1:
docs.text:
1. Select Docks - Chapter 9 on any mode.

  2. Complete the map without Pony being attacked. Please note that if you don't have all the badges and you are playing with someone who has them, then the player with all the required badges must be the one to complete the map with Pony following them, otherwise Step 2 won't commence. If you are playing with 3 or more players, it is recommended to have everyone else escape before the person with all the needed badges escapes.

docs.title: Step 2:
docs.text:
1. Select Camp - Chapter 11 on Swarm mode.

  2. Obtain the Blue Key and unlock the Blue Key door.

  3. Inside, there will be a keypad. Enter the code 467854 in the keypad and press the green button with a tick mark on it. The interface should say "PASSCODE ACCEPTED".

  4. You can either die to continue on with the next steps or beat the map, both will successfully count as completing this step.

docs.title: Phase 2:
docs.text:
Info

The numbers that are revealed using the wrench and the order of the symbols on the keypad changes every round.

docs.title: Step 1:
docs.text:
1. Select Lab - Chapter 12 on Bot mode (it is recommended to have someone distract the bot). You should see a keypad with symbols on the hallway to the left.

  2. Find four vent covers around the map and remove them with the Wrench.

  3. Each vent cover will reveal a number corresponding to the keypad.

  4. Type in the code in letters onto the keypad, from the closest number to the farthest. If the code is correct, the keypad should say "PASSCODE ACCEPTED" and a cutscene will play. If the code is incorrect, the keypad will say "SYSTEM LOCKED" and cannot be used for the rest of the round, forcing you to play another round.

An image of the symbols representing each number. Photo credits goes to:

THECREEPYHEADPHONES

on YouTube.

docs.title: Step 2:
docs.text: You will have a boss battle against TIO, the main antagonist of the whole game. Abilities are disabled during this battle.

docs.title: Part 1:
docs.text:
1. When you spawn in, there will be number codes from the Alleys map. Input the code into the keypad to unlock the next room.

  2. The next room has color codes from the Ship map. Start from the left wall and key in the colors in the direction of the arrows. Do the same thing for the right wall as well.

  3. The next room has the numerical puzzle from the Docks map. Input the Roman Numerals onto the rotating pillar.

  4. The next room has the symbol circle puzzle from the Temple map. The black arrow points into the middle of the circle. Ensure that the symbols are aligned to those on the wall.

  5. The next room has the roulette puzzle from the Camp map. Press the dots that are colored red onto the roulette puzzle or press the buttons randomly, but the latter strategy does take time.

Tip

The red dot on the wheel that is closest to the temple chapter always has an opposite, this means that if there is a red dot on the top left, there will be a red dot on the bottom right, the one closest to the roulette puzzle is always random.

  1. Walk into the Black Void while avoiding the three purple traps in front of it.

docs.title: Part 2:
docs.text:
1. Once you get teleported, find and give items to the following NPCs: Wooden Sword for Pony, The Pipe for Zee, and the Baseball Bat for Georgie. After doing this, TIO will enter a rage state (the bot automatically knows where you are and chases you around), and the upstairs section of the map will open.

  2. Go upstairs and give Doggy the bone, give Bunny the carrot, and give Zizzy the grass. Each one counts as one hit. Avoid the Shadow and White Sentinels. The Shadow Sentinel is VERY HARD to see, so be extremely careful and alert as possible.

  3. After Doggy, Bunny, and Zizzy all hit TIO with their respective weapons, TIO will be defeated, a cutscene will play, and you should get the Hidden Ending badge and the ??? skin.

I followed these steps and still didn't get the badge. What did I do wrong?

If you didn't get the badge, make sure to check the following:

  1. You (or someone else in the server) have all badges from both books, excluding any of the event badges, including all other badges from Factory, Lab, and Plant.

  2. You have the Savior Ending toggled in Settings, or else the keypad in Camp won't appear.

  3. If the keypad doesn't appear in Camp, then do Docks again and ensure the player with all the badges escapes with Pony following them.

  4. Make sure you're doing Swarm mode on the Camp map.

  5. Make sure you have 1:50 left on the timer on the Lab map for the second phase.
